extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Use strong passwords for administrative accounts on the device to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow WAGO's Cyber Security Handbook
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the instructions in WAGO's handbook 'Cyber Security for Controller' to implement recommended security practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device and avoid direct internet connections to enhance security.
